full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHUG LUGS RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN BEEd'URYA DKAR PO'I DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR GYI MCHOD BRJOD KYI TSIG 'GREL PA LAS R'A nA'I MDA' GSUM PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NARMAn K'A YA WA GINDRA SAmGHA,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI RIN CHEN 'DOD MOR 'JUG PA'I BDUD RTZI'I CHAB THIGS RGYUN PAS SNGON NAS DGE 'BREL DRAN SHES RNAM DPYOD MCHOG RMAD R'A MA rA'I MDA' RTZAL LDAN 'PHRIN LAS DBANG GZHU'I BRDA SPROD LA BRTEN NAS, ^ NARMA nA K'A YA WA GINDRA SAm GHA BADZRA GANtA PRA DZNY'AS R'A MA nA'I NYAG PHRAN GNAM RU GSUM PA PHYIS BZHIN RGYUD MAR LDONG BTAGS PA'I TSUL GYIS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
